About Us

Etally is a mobile phone friendly novel election tallying, reporting and analytical tool that reports and transmits election results in real time. The system uses the latest technologies and comes with high end security.

Elections in Africa are often characterized by a number of electoral malpractices during and on the final day of the electoral process. Etally solves this problem by providing “on the day” voter result management analysis and reporting in realtime across the 34,000 polling stations in the country.

For the first time, candidates can now get results in real-time and can accurately store, tally and independently verify their results.

  • Transmission of election results
  • Dissemination of election results
  • Vote tallying, summations and analysis
  • Evidence Gathering and storage

Services

Etally has four core functionalities for users of each polling station

Transmission

Transmission of election results

Dissemination

Dissemination of election results

Tallying

Vote tallying, summations and analysis

Gathering and storage

Evidence gathering and storage

Terry Pratchett

The Ephebians believed that every man should have the vote (provided that he wasn't poor, foreign, nor disqualified by reason of being mad, frivolous, or a woman). Every five years someone was elected to be Tyrant, provided he could prove that he was honest, intelligent, sensible, and trustworthy. Immediately after he was elected, of course, it was obvious to everyone that he was a criminal madman and totally out of touch with the view of the ordinary philosopher in the street looking for a towel. And then five years later they elected another one just like him, and really it was amazing how intelligent people kept on making the same mistakes.

Users

Etally has been tailor made and customized for different categories and types of unique users, a detail of each is listed as:

  • Election Candidates or Participants

    These include all participants in the electoral process from the lowest to highest level of any public office. This is specifically effective for large geographical locations and coverage on a national level for instance.

  • Election Observers & Monitoring Groups

    Election observers and independent monitoring groups require an insight and realtime provision of results for their comparative and general reporting purposes. This will keep them informed at all times.

  • Political Parties

    Political parties and their strategic interests in protecting their votes and managing independent or parallel tallying and verification centers is crucial to the electoral process. This ensures smooth and effective operations of the parties campaign and gaining state control.

  • Media Houses & Outlets

    Media Houses and there ever demanding need to produce and report on elections and the developments is crucial in keeping ahead of the game.

    The specific audio and video reporting functionality in the application is an important tool for breaking news and live reporting from the different polling stations around the country.
